p: N,N-Bis(diphenylphosphinoylmethyl) ethanolamine ( 12a): Yield: 95% (0.46 g), white crystal; Mp: 146–147 °C; 31P NMR (CDCl 3) δ: 28.9; 13C NMR (CDCl 3) δ: 55.5 (dd, 1J CP = 81.2, 3 J CP = 5.7, CH 2P), 59.9 (HOCH 2), 60.3 (t, 3 J CP = 5.3, CH 2N), 128.6 (m, C 3), 131.1 (m, C 2), 131.8 (d, 1 J CP = 96.3, C 1), 132.0 (brs, C 4); 1H NMR (CDCl 3) δ: 3.05 (t, J HH = 4.9, 2H, CH 2N), 3.56 (t, J HH = 4.9, 2H, HOC H 2), 3.82 (d, J HP = 3.9, 4H, CH 2P), 7.33–7.56 (m, 12H, C 2H, C 4H) 7.64–7.82 (m, 8H, C 3H); [M + H] + found = 490.1685, C 28H 30NO 3P 2 requires 490.1701.
